meanings.definition: Luxuriously soft and comfortable, as in the plushest carpet.
meanings.sent1: The plushest blanket kept me warm all night.
meanings.sent2: She sank into the plushest armchair in the room.
meanings.sent3: The plushest pillow in the house was actually a fluffy cloud.
meanings.sent4: His voice was the plushest melody I had ever heard.
meanings.sent5: Walking on the plushest grass felt like stepping on clouds.

meanings.definition: Of the highest quality or standard, as in the plushest hotel in town.
meanings.sent1: The plushest silk fabric was used for the royal gown.
meanings.sent2: They dined at the plushest restaurant in the city.
meanings.sent3: The plushest cake at the party was a tower of sweetness.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was the plushest welcome anyone could receive.
meanings.sent5: The plushest jewels sparkled under the bright lights.
